inclusion.criterion: criteria will be asked to participate in this randomized comparison study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: will be provided with an informed consent form which they can take home with them
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: randomization process will be performed using computer-generated simple random tables in a 1:1 ratio
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: study participants will be enrolled randomized, and the appropriate surgery scheduled
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: procedures will be performed on an outpatient basis whenever possible
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: all surgeries will be performed under a spinal or general anaesthesia
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: in case of coexisting vesical stone, holmium laser cystolithotripsy will be done first regardless the type of next procedure for the prostate
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: both HOLEP and greenLight (XPS) laser vaporization of the prostate begins with the insertion of a resectoscope transurethrally
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: examination of the lower urinary tract is performed and holmium laser fiber is used to enucleate (HOLEP) or to vaporize [greenLight (XPS)] the obstructing prostatic tissue using the Moxy fibre until the surgical capsule is reached
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: after treatment, the prostatic fossa will be examined for hemostasis and if adequate, a 22 french Foley catheter will be inserted
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patients will then be sent to the post-anaesthetic recovery room
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: once awake, the patient could have the catheter removed with a voiding trial if the urine is judged to be sufficiently clear and the surgeon is comfortable about early catheter removal
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: patient who have a neurological disorder which might affect bladder function as cerebrovascular stroke, Parkinson disease
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: 78 year-old male with history of BPH and multiple urological procedures. Severe urethral stricture requiring surgical intervention.
